item.title: Software I Use
item.description: Audio Session management RaySession Recording/Production/Mixing/Mastering Ardour Text Editors GNU Emacs, specifically the DOOM Emacs framework by Henrik Lissner. GNU Emacs Plugins I Use These are subject to change often and primarily informed/influenced by the aforementioned DOOM Emacs. Regardless, here are a few highlights off the top of my head: achievements citar-org-roam elcord evil-mode (with the +everywhere flag enabled) (Vim key-bindings) emms lispy and lispyville lorem-ipsum org-auto-tangle org-download org-drill org-fragtog org-heatmap
